events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process promptly.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience in software development.
Recruiter Sarah Johnson has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineering candidate.
Conducted the initial phone screening where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering concepts and problem-solving.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the screening results and expressed eagerness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate next Thursday at 10 AM to assess coding and system design skills.
